output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: No CMF number is present, but this isn't decisive.
2. Candidate Reference: - Directly mentions "George Simion" as president of Romania - Explicitly calls for voting for George Simion for president - Also mentions the poster's own parliamentary candidacy
3. Wide Population Targeting: - This is a paid advertisement - Reaches between 10,000-14,999 impressions - Targeting an estimated audience of 500,001-1,000,000 people - Published on both Facebook and Instagram - Clearly meant for mass communication
4. Electoral Objective: - Uses direct calls to action ("Votăm") - Explicitly promotes George Simion for president - Uses campaign slogans and emotional appeals (children, future of Romania) - Clear electoral intent for both presidential and parliamentary elections
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is clearly campaign material, not journalism - Contains direct voting instructions - Uses campaign messaging and party symbols
6. Personal Opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but a coordinated campaign message - Contains official party messaging and calls to action

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post clearly constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly calls for voting for a specific presidential candidate - Uses campaign messaging and emotional appeals - Is part of a paid advertising campaign - Reaches a wide audience through paid promotion - Contains direct voting instructions - Combines both parliamentary and presidential campaign messages
conclusion.message-for-police: Zărnescu Samuel, reprezentant AUR, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei pentru alegerile prezidențiale, promovând prin postare plătită pe Facebook (ID: 1535094047370846) un mesaj explicit de susținere și îndemn la vot pentru candidatul George Simion la președinție. Postarea conține îndemnuri directe la vot ("Votăm pentru George Simion președintele României"), fiind difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu un impact semnificativ demonstrat prin datele de reach (10,000-14,999 impresii). Mesajul constituie propagandă electorală conform Art. 36(7) din Legea 334/2006, îndeplinind toate criteriile: referire directă la candidat, obiectiv electoral explicit și adresare către publicul larg prin intermediul platformelor de social media.
